name: Sonic Death
overview: Can you save your man? Could "E" be the missing letter? As you slowly approach the keyboard your hands tremble with fear, you type the missing letter and the screen. flashes, you saved your man once more but will you be able to do it again? For Sonic Death awaits you in the water. Sonic Death features a 1-4 player option, over 100 different words, high resolution graphics with many colors and sound effects.
